medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 2-year history of auditory hallucinations that had become louder over several days. The hallucinations involved voices of the patient’s mother and brother, blaming him for his mother’s death and sometimes urging him to shoplift. The patient reported having 2 severe headaches in the prior 6 weeks.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of cocaine and alcohol abuse, sober for over 200 days; brother with schizophrenia. No significant medical or psychiatric history noted.
medical_history.social_history: History of cocaine and alcohol abuse, but has been sober for over 200 days.
